title: Bug 120216 - Group dialog should be shown even if dataset is not set
description: When trying to access the group dialog, an error is shown instead of the expected behavior of showing the dialog. As part of the template requirements, the UI should not perform any validation and should display the group dialog regardless of whether the dataset is set or not.
OB: When trying to access the group dialog, an error is shown
EB: The group dialog should be shown regardless of whether the dataset is set or not
SR:
1. Open the application
2. Navigate to the group dialog section
3. Verify that the group dialog is displayed even if the dataset is not set
